titles.title: Air Force Depot Workers Fairness Act
Air Force Depot Workers Fairness Act

To provide that, for purposes of certain Government facilities, the rate at which a Federal employee earns compensatory time for irregular or occasional overtime work shall be increased so as to permit greater parity with rates of overtime pay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Air Force Depot Workers Fairness Act - Authorizes federal civilian employees of the U.S. Air Force Depots at Tinker ALC in Oklahoma, Ogden ALC in Utah, and Warner Robbins ALC in Georgia to earn compensatory time for irregular or occasional overtime work at a rate that is one and one-half times the amount of time spent in such work instead of overtime pay, wage-board overtime pay, or Sunday rates.
